title: Cinematics
body: Anyone know if good old rito has another cinematic ready for 2k17? all there other ones have been great and haven't seen a new one in a while

replies.body: Haha nah like the fights like new dawn
I liked the Amumu one, had meaning, made you feel things, I mean, i don't doubt there have been people who "felt things" while watching it, but it does give you an emotional pang of pity for Amumu.
A new dawn is my fave, good fight scene tbh
Hopefully there'll be one for the Eve rework
